subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded James Blake struggled after a rain delay and was upset by the defending champion, Dimitry Tursunov, 4-6, 6-3, 6-4, in the semifinals of the Indianapolis Tennis Championships. Tursunov, the third seed, will meet second-seeded Gilles Simon in the final Sunday. Simon outlasted fourth-seeded Sam Querrey, 6-3, 4-6, 6-4.
